title: Interpersonal Skills for Elite Leaders and Project Managers
headline: Learn about crucial interpersonal skills used by elite leaders and project managers in this free online course.
description: Interpersonal Skills for Elite Leaders and Project Managers is a free online course that provides you with the broad knowledge of various interpersonal techniques and skills. You will be exposed to the up-to-date methods used for handling people, subtle personal adjustments that you can make to win people over and many different methods for telephonic conversations with a focus on efficiency and professionalism.

courseDescription:
This free online Interpersonal Skills course carefully and critically analyzes interpersonal skills successfully used by various professionals and the key themes cover “man-management”, winning people over and telephone skills. This leadership training course on Interpersonal Skills for Elite Leaders and Project Managers will ensure that you stand out in these critical areas and the character, qualities, and communication skills required to succeed will be discussed in practical terms. Did you know that showing care is an obvious but often overlooked skill for elite leaders to have? Do you know what the implications are of not paying attention to team members' opinions? Or which common causes of distractions occur during formal or informal presentations? All of these questions are comprehensively covered as well as the visualization technique needed to ensure attentiveness during meetings and presentations.

Some key leadership principles topics in the leadership certificate covers the importance of listening over talking, ways to keep the attention away from oneself and rather your team members, subtle adjustments you can make such as smiling and body language. Study the importance of a smile to people along with a brief history and fun facts on the significance of smiling. Communication plays a vital role in workplace success and interpersonal relationships and the use of language and vocabulary is studied in the next part of the content. This sets the tone as you learn the real essence of energy and enthusiasm along with the overarching role your personality plays during any kind of interaction. This energy and enthusiasm especially applies to telephone etiquette and you will study the best sequence or way of answering the phone for various individuals and how an engaging, friendly personality can rub off on the next person.

The content in this soft skills course has been carefully curated using the latest and best techniques from elite leaders and project managers. You can improve your interpersonal-, leadership- and communication skills, by enrolling in this free online leadership course whether you are a student hoping to get on better with your peers and lecturers or a leader wanting to create a better team culture through espousing a more conducive demeanour.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard.   • Lesson Summary
    • Most successful project managers and senior leaders of organizations seem to have it all figured out and exhume so much confidence, this is all possible by their unique way of dealing with others.
    • Communication fumbles and lack of good interpersonal skills can be very disastrous in the cooperate world.
    • This course boosts 3 sections that have objectives, concept discussion, examples, and activities.
    • Learners are required to document the concepts learned, complete all activities when prompted, and connect with the trainer.
    • The three topics that make up this section are how to let your team members know you care, how to pay total attention to what team members are saying, and how to ask about them. They are all centered on the necessary techniques for handling others.
    • Going the extra mile to understanding difficulties, keeping your mind alert to observe if other people are facing problems, acknowledging people, making a mental note of their problems, and helping them where possible are the ways to show care.
    • Giving your speaker a warm smile, giving a total body turn in the direction of the speaker, fixing your constant gaze on the speaker, and asking the right questions to understand the situation are visualization techniques to show your team members that they have your total attention.
    • Asking about your team members' life and passion, keeping the attention away from you, and giving a listening ear are some of the ways to build a positive environment for excellence.

  • Learning Outcomes
  • Having completed this module, you will be able to:
    • State the importance of a smile on people and facts on the significance of smiling.
    • Outline the steps to winning the minds of people with a smile.
    • Analyze how to properly read body language and ways to spot out a fiddle.
    • Outline exceptional cases where the environment plays a role in the fiddle.
    • Explain the roles and compare the reports of a consultant to a regular managerial report.
    • Outline the ways to sound more efficient like a consultant.

  • How To Speak Like a Consultant

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Lesson Summary
    • Smiling is one of the most basic biological uniform expressions of all humans.
    • Smiling is as stimulating as receiving up to £16,000 in cash. Smiling can make you healthier
    • Steps to smiling more gradually include; walking into a room, looking at the individual's face, absorb in their personality the allow a bright beautiful smile that overflows into your eyes.
    • A big warm smile is an asset and when it comes slower, it becomes more credible as it convinces your recipient that it is genuinely and only for them.
    • Don't use the same smile for each individual, let each of your smiles reflect the more modest variations of your feelings about the recipient.
    • Your body is a broadcasting network that is constantly relaying what's on your mind.
    • When your body and mind are not in sync, one may experience; a change in breathing pattern, sweating, increased heart rate, and blood pressure, and the individual may become emotionally aroused.
    • When you observe people also observe the surrounding settings as they may show signs of fiddling.
    • Consultants are hired by organizations to study their business and recommend improvements.
    • The world perceives people with rich vocabularies to be more creative and more intelligent.
    • Steps to speaking like a consultant include; adding a few words to your vocabulary, identify suitable synonyms to the simple words, personalize these words and put them into your everyday conversation.

  • Learning Outcomes
  • Having completed this module, you will be able to:
    • Discuss the necessity for incredible techniques for telephonic conversations.
    • Analyze the telephone technique of treating every call with a high level of energy and enthusiasm.
    • Outline the best sequence or way of answering the phone for various individuals.
    • Discuss the need for meeting and studying an individual's personality.
    • Explain the need for individuals to rub off a bit of their personality during telephone calls.

  • Sounding Off Your Personality

  • Sounding Off Your Personality

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Lesson Summary
    • Treating every call as though it was the first of the day with a high level of energy and enthusiasm used to be the best way to treat every call.
    • Steps to sounding proper on calls are captured in the following steps:
    1. Begin your calls naturally.
    2. If the caller is known, get the necessary warmth and sincerity instantaneously and kick off the conversation.
    3. If the caller is unknown, you can wait till you understand why the person has called then you add a sincere smile and share your warmth with the caller.
    • When you meet a person physically, you can see through the other individual's personality. You see the overall body structure and facial expressions but all these are not visible in a phone call.
    • To make up for the missing physical personality on the phone, respond to calls using words and phrases such as; I see, I get it, Oh, Really, This is fantastic, This presentation looks marvelous, amongst others.
    • Rather than just smile when a joke is cracked, laugh wholeheartedly. 
    • Just be yourself and fine-tune your personality to be more audible on a call. It helps listeners hear your personality.
